data.title: Climate & Weather Averages in Zagreb, Croatia
data.meta_description: Climate data and weather averages in Zagreb
data.text:
Currently: 22 °C. Clear. (Weather station: Zagreb / Pleso, Croatia). See more current weather

Annual Weather Averages Near Zagreb

Averages are for Zagreb / Pleso, which is 11 kilometers from Zagreb.

Based on weather reports collected during 1992–2021.
